results.content:
This course covers a lot without overloading the topics. This is exactly what a beginner needs to get confident with the core functionality of JavaScript without being overwhelmed by the stuff.

Daumen hoch Max!

results.content: He explains every little detail and the working of the code very well. Topics which we usually overlook, are explained by him so well. I would really appreciate his effort, to make tiny videos of every little topic, just to clarify our doubts and clear our basic understanding.
results.content_html: He explains every little detail and the working of the code very well. Topics which we usually overlook, are explained by him so well. I would really appreciate his effort, to make tiny videos of every little topic, just to clarify our doubts and clear our basic understanding.

results.content: Really good course. Covers a lot and with good examples. Missing some of the latest ES6 updates but he has done another course for those which you can check out after.
results.content_html: Really good course. Covers a lot and with good examples. Missing some of the latest ES6 updates but he has done another course for those which you can check out after.

results.content: An excellent course where in a relative short time, the most important parts of Javascript are being taught in a very clear way with good examples. Maximilian is a gifted teacher who is able to explain complex things in a simple way. One of my favorite courses.
results.content_html: An excellent course where in a relative short time, the most important parts of Javascript are being taught in a very clear way with good examples. Maximilian is a gifted teacher who is able to explain complex things in a simple way. One of my favorite courses.

results.content: It could be better by adding more projects and with good explanations.
